question: How do I Clone the Dojo repos?
How do I setup a Dojo dev environment?
answer:
Start by installing Rust and running the test suite to confirm your setup:
rustup override set stable && rustup update && cargo test

Note: Depending on your Linux distribution, you may need to install additional dependencies. Make sure to install any suggested or missing dependencies that arise during the setup process.
- Next, install the Scarb package manager by running:
curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://docs.swmansion.com/scarb/install.sh | sh

- Install the Cairo 1.0 extension for Visual Studio Code.

question: What are the necessary components to begin with Dojo?
How can I download the Dojo repository?
What are the steps to configure a development environment for Dojo?
answer:
Begin by setting up Rust and executing the test suite to verify your installation: rustup override set stable && rustup update && cargo test

Note: Your specific Linux distribution may require you to install extra dependencies. Ensure you install any dependencies that are recommended or missing during the installation.

Proceed by installing the Scarb package manager with the following command: curl --proto ‘=https’ --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://docs.swmansion.com/scarb/install.sh | sh

Complete the setup by adding the Cairo 1.0 extension to Visual Studio Code.
